Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A highly effective photovoltaic polymer with near - infrared response , poly{N- [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione-5 0 ,5 00 -diyl } {PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)} , was synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| near - infrared response |
| PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) |

The two "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "near - infrared response" and "PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)". "Near - infrared response" describes the ability of the polymer to respond to near-infrared light, while "PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)" is the name of the synthesized photovoltaic polymer.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| near - infrared response |

After reviewing the paragraph, the only clear "Property Value" entity that refers to a material property is "near - infrared response". This term describes the ability of the polymer to respond to near-infrared light, which is a valuable property for photovoltaic materials. The other entity, "PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)", is the name of the synthesized polymer and not a property value.
